page.title: 08A Typical Day,Agnes,Scilly
page.content: I got up at 7.30am in the mo rning.I dressed then went downstairs and had a breakfast of Weetabix.After breakfast I had to feed my guinea pigs ,comb my hair ,make my bed ,wash and clean my teeth and get the milk can for our visitors and then take it back full of milk. Mr Andrew Davis,the Vanguard boatman took us acoss.As mother had the pushchair I held Julian for her while she folded it.When we were going out of the shop my dad came and picked us up in his boat,The Vasna.At St Agnes I went down to my friend Sara's house for tea.After tea Sara's brother Lyndon joined in and played Blind Man's Buff with us.At 8.30pm I went home and to bed.
